column4: I need help on how you know the tool thing with the accessories and everything. I need help to get it back because all it shows is the places, system, and quit button. Do you know how to fix it?
I need help on how you know the tool thing with the accessories and everything. I need help to get it back because all it shows is the places, system, and quit button. Do you know how to fix it?
Right click on your panel, go to add to panel, and then find the 'Menu Bar' item.
